elements.name: Creator navigates to Contributors tab

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Contributors tab
they see "Add Contributor" Button is enabled
they see the tab Description is clickable
they see the tab Resource Type is clickable
they see the tab Contributors is selected
they see the tab Files and License is clickable
they see Previous is enabled
they see Next is enabled
they see Save is enabled

elements.name: Creator adds themselves to the list of Authors

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Contributors tab
they see the "Add Author" Button
they click "Add Author"
they see the Author Search Dialog
they click "Add me as Author"
their Author identity is added to the list of Authors
their current Affiliations are listed

elements.name: Creator adds an Author to the list of Authors

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Contributors tab
they see the "Add Author" Button
they click "Add Author"
they search for Author in the Author Search Dialog
they select an Author identity
they click "Add"
the selected Author identity is added to the list of Authors
their current Affiliations are listed

elements.name: Creator adds an Author to the list of Authors for Resource Type Book, Monograph

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Resources tab
they select Resource Type "Book"
they select Registration Subtype "Monograph"
they navigate to the Contributors tab
they see the "Add Author" Button
they click "Add Author"
they search for Author in the Author Search Dialog
they select an Author identity
they click "Add"
the selected Author identity is added to the list of Authors
their current Affiliations are listed

elements.name: Creator adds an Author to the list of Authors for Resource Type Chapter

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Resources tab
they select the Resource Type
they select the Registration Subtype "Chapter in anthology"
they navigate to the Contributors tab
they see the "Add Author" Button
they click "Add Author"
they search for Author in the Author Search Dialog
they select an Author identity
they click "Add"
the selected Author identity is added to the list of Authors
their current Affiliations are listed

elements.name: Creator adds an Editor to the list of Editors for Resource Type Book, Anthology

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Resources tab
they select Resource Type "Book"
they select Registration Subtype "Anthology"
they navigate to the Contributors tab
they see the "Add Editor" Button
they click "Add Editor"
they search for Editor in the Author Search Dialog
they select an Author identity
they click "Add"
the selected Author identity is added to the list of Editors
their current Affiliations are listed

elements.name: Creator adds a Supervisor to the list of Supervisors for Resource Type Student Thesis

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Resources tab
they select Resource Type "Student Thesis"
they select any Registration Subtype
they navigate to the Contributors tab
they see the "Add Author" Button
they see the "Add Supervisor" Button
they click "Add Supervisor"
they search for Supervisor in the Author Search Dialog
they select an Author identity
they click "Add"
the selected Author identity is added to the list of Supervisors

steps.name: their current Affiliations are listed

elements.name: Creator creates a new Author in the Author dialog

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Contributors tab
they see the "Add Author" Button
they click "Add Author"
they see the "Create new Author" Button
they click "Create new Author"
they see fields:
they see the "Create new Author" Button in the Create new Author Dialog

elements.name: Creator sees Button to Verify Contributor

steps.name: Creator navigates to Contributors tab
the Registration has an Unverified Contributor
they see a Button to Verify the Contributor

elements.name: Creator opens Dialog to Verify Contributor

steps.name: Creator sees Button to Verify Contributor
they click the Button to Verify Contributor
they see the Verify Contributor Dialog
they see a search field prefilled with the selected Contributor's name
they see a list of Persons matching the search

elements.name: Creator verifies Contributor

steps.name: Creator opens Dialog to Verify Contributor
they select a Person from the Search Results
they click the Button to Verify Contributor
the Dialog is closed
they see the Contributor is now verified
all current Affiliations are listed for the Contributor

elements.name: Creator begins Wizard registration and navigates to Description tab

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard
they navigate to the Description tab
they see the Description tab is selected
they see fields:
they see the tab Resource Type is clickable
they see the tab Contributors is clickable
they see the tab Files and License is clickable
they see a Button for creating a new Project is enabled
they see Next is enabled
they see Save is enabled

elements.name: Creator sees that fields are validated on Description tab

steps.name: Creator begins Wizard registration and navigates to Description tab
they click the Save button
they can see "Mandatory" error messages for fields:

elements.name: Creator searches for Project

steps.name: Creator begins Wizard registration and navigates to Description tab
they see a Search box for Projects
they enter search term in the Search box
they see list of Projects matching the search term
they see title and associated Institutions for each Project

elements.name: Creator adds a Project

steps.name: Creator searches for Project
they select a Project from the Search results
the selected Project is added to the list of selected Projects

elements.name: Creator removes a Project

steps.name: Creator adds a Project
they click the Remove Project icon
they see the Project is removed from the list of selected Projects

elements.name: Creator opens dropdown with Allowed Vocabularies

steps.name: Creator begins Wizard registration and navigates to Description tab
their Institution has a Vocabulary set as "Allowed"
they click "Add Vocabulary"
they can see a dropdown with Allowed Vocabularies

elements.name: Creator sees input field for an Allowed Vocabulary

steps.name: Creator opens dropdown with Allowed Vocabularies
they select an Allowed Vocabulary
they see an input field for the selected Vocabulary

elements.name: Creator sees input field for a Default Vocabulary

steps.name: Creator begins Wizard registration and navigates to Description tab
their Institution has a Vocabulary set as "Default"
they can see an input field for the Default Vocabulary

elements.name: Creator opens Dialog for creating a new Project

steps.name: Creator begins Wizard registration and navigates to Description tab
they click Button for creating a new Project
they see a Dialog with input fields:
they see a Cancel Button
they see a Save Button

elements.name: Creator creates a new Project

steps.name: Creator opens Dialog for creating a new Project
they enter a Project Title
they select a Coordinating Institution
they select a Project Manager
they set a Start Date
they click Save
the Dialog is closed
they see a confirmation message that the Project was created
they see the Project is listed under Project Associations

name: Creator navigates to Resource Type tab

elements.name: Creator navigates to Resource Type tab

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard with a File
they navigate to the Resource Type tab
they see the field for Type
they see the tab Description is clickable
they see the tab Resource Type is selected
they see the tab Contributors is clickable
they see the tab Files and License is clickable
they see Previous is enabled
they see Next is enabled
they see Save is enabled

elements.name: Creator sees that fields are validated on Resource Type tab

steps.name: Creator begins registering a Registration in the Wizard with a File
they navigate to the Resource Type tab
they click the Save button
they can see "Mandatory" error messages for fields:

elements.name: User without their Feide ID in ARP logs in

steps.name: that the user logs in with their Feide ID
they do not have their Feide ID in any ARP entry
they see a list containing "Name", "Last registration" and "Institutions" for each ARP entry matching their name
they see a Create New Author Button
they see a Support button

elements.name: User with their Feide ID in ARP logs in

steps.name: that the user logs in with their Feide ID
their Feide ID is in an ARP entry
they can see their name in the menu

elements.name: User creates a new Author identity

steps.name: that the user logs in with their Feide ID
they do not have their Feide ID in any ARP entry
they see proposed name for a new Author identity based on data from their Feide account
they click Create Author identity button
this new Author identity is added to ARP
their Feide ID is added to their Author identity
their Organization ID (Cristin ID) is added to their Author identity
they can see confirmation message that they have connected an Author identity

elements.name: User updates an Author identity

steps.name: that the user logs in with their Feide ID
they do not have their Feide ID in any ARP entry
they see a list containing "Name", "Last registration" and "Institutions" for each ARP entry matching their name
they select an Author identity
they click Connect Author identity
their Feide ID is added to their Author identity
their Organization ID (Cristin ID) is added to their Author identity
they can see confirmation message that they have connected an Author identity

elements.name: User adds an ORCID to their Author identity

steps.name: that the user has just connected to an Author identity
they can see confirmation message that they have connected an Author identity
their Author identity do not have any connection to ORCID
they click the Next button
they see a dialog for connecting ORCID
they click Create or add ORCID
they are redirected to ORCID for login
they log into ORCID
they accept that NVA uses their data
they are redirected back to NVA
their ORCID is added to their Author identity
they see their ORCID on My Profile
